Title: Mukashi no Yama
Description: ["Inspired by Katsuhiko Kamimura's ", Myths of India, ', a collection of short stories on Hindu mythology, ', Mukashi no Yama, ' tells a poetic and humerus tale about mountains that could fly. When they fell to the ground, the earth shook with a great sound. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Official Website)']
